title: Fredericksburg & Spotsylvania National Military Park: Donate
body: Donate        Your donations help preserve, protect, and interpret Civil War battlefields! Buddy Secor   Â    Since Fredericksburg & Spotsylvania is a fee free park, we rely heavily on donations to fund exhibits and special programs, hire employees, and maintain these hallowed landscapes. Help us continue to improve our park and all that it has to offer!     Fredericksburg and Spotsylvania National Military Park is able to accept tax-deductible donations directly. You may send those to:     Park Superintendent Fredericksburg and Spotsylvania National Military Park 120 Chatham Lane Fredericksburg, VA 22405-2508
